code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"../services/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminBookings=()=>{const[bookings,setBookings]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBookings=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/bookings");setBookings(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching bookings:",error);}};fetchBookings();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Bookings Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"min-w-full bg-white border",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Booking ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Client Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:bookings.map(booking=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:booking._id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:booking.clientEmail}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:booking.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{className:"px-4 py-2 border",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-yellow-400 px-2 py-1 rounded",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-red-500 px-2 py-1 rounded text-white ml-2",children:"Delete"})]})]},booking._id))})]})]});};export default AdminBookings;
